佢做咗特首之後做咗咩壞事？


Reject to have an open debate on the joint checkpoint arrangement at the west Kowloon station.

Denied entry of a U.K. Conservative party member.

Double standard - Banners that insulted the son of CHOI Yue-lin and LIU Xiaobo


第一，有哂時間表講好會點做
第二，個別例子
第三，不幸事件唔好再講



First, time table? Where is it? Are you kidding? The government dare not open a public consultation, despite its claim that the majority support the joint checkpoint arrangement. Are we living in a parallel universe?

Second, it's not an independent event. The HKSAR shamefully surrender its Basic Law rights to china. Independent event? Be professional, 50 cents.

Third, double standard shows. It is also a misfortune of the people of HK to have such a double standard biased government.


50 cents, you lmao
